title: Keen 5 last level help.
content:
I need some help with the final level of K5. I can't get the blue crystal. The dogs keep getting me no matter which way I approach it (from the top or bottom).

Thanking you in advance.


Bussy

Take the long way around, approach from the bottom, and just shoot up at them.  Your shots can travel up through the underside of the cylindrical platform, the same way you can jump up through it to land on top.  :-)

title: Re: ...
content: Yeah, it even may be that the upper route is what the game makers intended to be used.. Although I always use the short route. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] Eat your veggies!

title: haha
content: Well, if you're both fast and lucky, you can take the short route and just down-jump beneath the whole thing, right?

title: Re: haha
content: That's right. It's even possible on the hard game mode (and without shooting!), although it takes a LOT load-games for me in that case (hard mode and no shots).Eat your veggies!

title: Re: haha
content:
Indeed it does; one of the few times where I actually gave up trying. [And later succeeded by pure luck almost a year later]

A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/rcwn.png[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

title: Re: haha
content: Thats rilly hard to do! After you get used to it its not quite as bad though. Have you ever tried just shooting them without jumping down?  I think its impossible, but sometimes its kind of fun to try[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]  the best i did is get three or four and then i died

title: Re: haha
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]Well, if you're both fast and lucky, you can take the short route and just down-jump beneath the whole thing, right? [hr][/quote]
Yes, i also know this solution. But i prefer the long way, because it contains lots of items. And, you will need anyway to jump up near the begin of this level, because the room with a green gem is hidden in the top.[img]http://classicgaming.com/cc314/encyclopedia/images/enemyk4-wormouth.gif[/img]

title: Re: haha
content:
"And, you will need anyway to jump up near the begin of this level, because the room with a green gem is hidden in the top."
I always climb up the other way around.. As you know, you can get both up and down there. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

LL - yeah, talk about it.. First trying to get down.. Then walking to right and trying to jump there to get the blue gem. Then trying to get out of there again, down..Eat your veggies!
